structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.history: Repealed 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 36, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 485, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 349, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1988; and ch. 351, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 107, secs. 1, 4, and 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Service credit for other public employment by delayed contribution payment -- Recalculation of benefits for retirees.
